Text: It seems to be a little problem with this rip, track 5 starts a little late. This is a rare problem, so I didn't notice till it was too late. It's also easy to solve. I use to edit torrents with excessive number of tracks (opera ones mostly) , wich are merged into one file using Audacity (a free, user friendly program). All you have to do is cut and paste the tracks. Sorry for the inconvenience.
